name: meritoriously
content:

in a way that deserves great praise, or arranged according to who or what deserves praise: Most dishes on the menu seemed more focused on looking impressive than on being meritoriously special in their own right. She has served her country meritoriously as a consultant to the Ministry of Health, and to various international organizations.
